SectionBody.Text: After the effective date of this act, the Secretary of State shall furnish to each of the states approving the Interstate Compact on Educational Opportunity for Military Children an enrolled copy of this act.

Note.Text: Section 3, ch. 2010-52, provides that “[s]ections 1000.36, 1000.37, 1000.38, and 1000.39, Florida Statutes, shall stand repealed 3 years after the effective date of this act unless reviewed and saved from repeal through reenactment by the Legislature.”
